name: Barbarian Life
description:
Barbarian Life

Hack and slash game where you live the life of barbarian questing for glory

Features
  • Straightforward bloody combat
  • Random sequence of 5 maps each play trough
  • 13 different maps
  • 11 different enemies
  • 20+ small stories
  • Go for highest score you can

Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • left click to attack
  • right click to throw a picked up weapon

Originally planned for mobile. I wanted to release this version on web for fun and to get some feedback. Mobile version will release most likely late January. Made with Godot engine

Twitter where I keep posting stuff about the developement

Music:

The Gatekeepers by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com

The Fall Of Heroes by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
